page.title: 01RURAL MIDLANDS
page.content: The block is more than three quarters covered by gently undulating{FARMLAND} between 100-130 metres above sea level The other quarter in the north-east corner is privately owned Bitteswell { {AIRPORT. Willey in the far north is the only village on a quiet country lane.A farm ing community with three working farms in the main street.There are nine more working farms in the area,although much of their land extends beyond the block. The main A5,{WATLING STREET},runs through the eastern half of the block marking the County boundary between Leicestershire(NE) & Warwickshire(SW). Two small areas of woodland runs down the far west of the block in which there are two lakes fed from natural local springs.
